meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>tsunami</radical> which washes a <radical>plate</radical> out into the <radical>sun</radical>. Because it's in the sun, it becomes  <kanji>warm</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The plate starts to get so <kanji>warm</kanji> that you could fry an <reading>on</reading>ion (おん) on it. Who doesn’t love fried onions? That plate sure is warm enough, so start cookin’ ‘em!
